project_abstract.cdata: The project would include: installation of 18,300 lines of automatic switching equipment; construction of new microwave link between Kumasi and Takoradi and replacement of the Accra-Tema link; expansion of the telex service by addition of 300 lines; and provision of consultancy services and training of personnel.
